summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 3, 4, 5, 6 and the east 25 feet of Lot 2, Block 24; Lot 8, 9, 10 and 11, Block 25; Lots 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5, Block 29; Lots 9 and 10, Block 30; all in the Woodland Addition to Salmon Bay City; a portion of the northeast quarter of the southeast quarter of Section 4-25-4, being known as Lot 52 High-Hurst on the Hill Addition (unrecorded); Lots 1, 2 and 8 and the vacated alley adjoining, Block 2, Eastern Addition; and Lot 11, Block 75 Carleton Park Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-311 and 17-250, respectively.
